featured.text: Some critics have said that MOOCs promote an unrealistic one-size-fits-all model of higher education and that there is no replacement for true dialogues between professors and their students.
Which of the following descriptions does NOT fit her?
It should loosely fit on the body to be turned around.
Public dwellings lined its ground level; a marketplace and two mosques also fit comfortably inside.

other.text: Early this past summer the three whales were pronounced fit enough to be returned to the Atlantic Ocean.
In order to stay healthy and fit, John exercises _____.

definition.en_def: In good health; suitable or appropriate.
definition.example: She exercises regularly to stay fit.
